Sure! There are many great VR games available across a variety of genres. Here are a few popular ones that are definitely worth trying:

1. Beat Saber - a rhythm game where players slice through blocks with lightsabers to the beat of music. 2. Superhot VR - a first-person shooter game where time moves only when the player moves, allowing for strategic gameplay. 3. Half-Life: Alyx - a first-person shooter game set in the Half-Life universe that features complex puzzles and immersive environments. 4. Vader Immortal - a Star Wars-inspired adventure that lets players wield a lightsaber and explore the galaxy. 5. The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners - a survival game set in the world of The Walking Dead, featuring intuitive melee combat and tough gameplay decisions. 6. Job Simulator - a lighthearted game that lets players perform ordinary tasks like cooking and office work in a bizarre future world. 7. Arizona Sunshine - a zombie shooting game that can be played solo or with friends in co-op mode. These are just a few suggestions, and there are many more VR games available that cater to different interests and preferences.
